profile.name: Sunny Pharande
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.bio: Passionate software developer with a focus on creating intuitive and efficient web applications. Experienced in modern web technologies and committed to delivering high-quality solutions.

achievements.title: First Prize - Global Hackathon 2024
achievements.description: Led a team that developed an AI-powered solution for climate change monitoring.

achievements.description: Recognized for contributions to distributed systems research.

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor

achievements.title: Web Accessibility Champion
achievements.description: Improved accessibility standards across multiple projects, ensuring WCAG compliance.

achievements.title: Tech Community Leader
achievements.description: Founded a local developer meetup group with over 500 active members.
